content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with a potential tenant named Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for the apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The question did not result in a final agreed price. The last proposed price from my side was €800.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate the likeability of Max Müller as 8. He was respectful and persistent, but we couldn't quite reach an agreed price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation. The conversation was conducted in a respectful and professional manner.
name: Peter Schmidt
